title: Couple With Heart Person Man Medium Skin Tone Medium Light Skin Tone

apple_vendor_description: This depiction on Apple devices showcases a couple, a man and another person, with medium and medium-light skin tones, united by a vibrant red heart floating between them, a hallmark of Appleâ€™s expressive emoji library.
